We’re getting close to an energy crisis - Heather du Plessis-Allan https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/were-getting-close-to-an-energy-crisis-heather-du-plessis-allan/WL3KPZEI4NH47OY7EBS7WUD6ZY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/were-getting-close-to-an-energy-crisis-heather-du-plessis-allan/WL3KPZEI4NH47OY7EBS7WUD6ZY/ Heather du Plessis-AllanOPINION: Our electricity prices last week were said to be the highest in the world. Sat, 10 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Building new power generation will take years. Finding more gas – which we desperately need – will take years, if anyone wants to look for it, which they don’t. Even the quickest fix of importing LNG from Australia is at least a year away, writes Heather du Plessis-Allan. Photo / Getty Images
